website_summaries.verdict: The Xperia L4's 21:9 display is impressive, but Sony will have to do much more to be considered among the best budget phones once again.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the phone for 48 hours, and here are my initial impressions: + The phone feel stury and premium in the hand and provides good grip + The screen is surprisingly good, despite being only a HD+ LCD screen, very colorful and bright + Versatile camera quality with good picture quality when there is enough light + Front camera is very good + Amazing battery life, full day usage with lots of streaming and still more than 50% left + Fast carging , but fast charger is not included in box, so you have to buy it separately + Good connectivity: USB C, BT 5.0, NFC and DualBand WiFi
